name: create_pie_chart
description: Generate a customizable pie chart from direct input or a file (CSV, Excel, JSON, JSONL). Supports label-value aggregation.

labels.description: Labels for each slice (if not loading from file)

sizes.description: Values corresponding to each label (if not loading from file)

file_path.description: Optional file to load data from (.csv, .xlsx, .json, .jsonl)

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index (used only for Excel files)

category_col.description: Column name or index to use as pie slice labels

value_col.description: Column name or index to use as pie slice values

agg_method.description: Aggregation method for duplicate labels if reading from file

save_path.description: Path to save the generated pie chart image (e.g., ./output.png)
